body_html:
find the operator you want to modify (Operator op = {the operator contains nms_th})
op.mutable_arg(0)->set_f({the value you want to fill});

I refer to
https://github.com/caffe2/models/blob/master/detectron/e2e_faster_rcnn_R-50-C4_2x/predict_net.pbtxt

I assume that nms_thres is what you want and it's in the 0th place. May be you need to check is index 0 or not
